privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: minLink privacy policy - How we collect, use and protect your data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how minLink collects, uses and protects your information when you use our URL shortening service.

items.urls: Original URLs that you shorten through our service
items.analytics: Click data, geographic location and devices used
items.technical: Technical information such as IP address, browser and operating system

items.service: Provide and improve our URL shortening service
items.analytics: Generate statistics and usage analytics for links
items.security: Detect and prevent malicious activities or spam

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except when required by law or to protect our legal rights.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and collect analytical data. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us through GitHub: https://github.com/gpaiva00

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.description: minLink terms of service - Rules and conditions of use

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using minLink, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, do not use our service.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: minLink is a free URL shortening service that allows you to transform long links into shorter, easier-to-share versions.

items.legal: Using the service only for legal and legitimate purposes
items.harmful: Not shortening URLs that contain harmful, offensive or illegal content
items.spam: Not using the service for spam or malicious activities
items.malware: Not shortening links that direct to malware or dangerous sites

prohibitedUse.title: Prohibited Use
prohibitedUse.content: It is prohibited to use minLink for:

items.illegal: Illegal activities or those that violate local, national or international laws
items.phishing: Phishing, fraud or identity theft attempts
items.abuse: Abuse, harassment or discrimination against individuals or groups

serviceAvailability.title: Service Availability
serviceAvailability.content: While we strive to keep the service available 24/7, we do not guarantee uninterrupted availability. We may temporarily suspend the service for maintenance or updates.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: minLink is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for direct, indirect or consequential damages arising from the use of the service.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon publication.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, contact us through GitHub: https://github.com/gpaiva00
